sentence.text: Based on in vitro studies in human liver microsomes, des-ciclesonide appears to have no inhibitory or induction potential on the metabolism of other drugs metabolized by CYP 450 enzymes.
sentence.negationtags: Based on in vitro studies in human liver microsomes, des-ciclesonide appears to have <scope> <cue> no </cue> inhibitory or induction potential on the metabolism of other drugs metabolized by CYP 450 enzymes. </scope>

sentence.text: The inhibitory potential of ciclesonide on CYP450 isoenzymes has not been studied.
sentence.negationtags: The inhibitory potential of ciclesonide on CYP450 isoenzymes has <scope> <cue> not </cue> been studied. </scope>

sentence.text: In vitro studies demonstrated that the plasma protein binding of des-ciclesonide was not affected by warfarin or salicylic acid, indicating no potential for protein binding-based drug interactions.
sentence.negationtags: In vitro studies demonstrated that the plasma protein binding of des-ciclesonide was <scope> <cue> not </cue> affected by warfarin or salicylic acid, indicating no potential for protein binding-based drug interactions. </scope>

sentence.text: In a drug interaction study, co-administration of orally inhaled ciclesonide and oral erythromycin, an inhibitor of cytochrome P450 3A4, had no effect on the pharmacokinetics of either des-ciclesonide or erythromycin.
sentence.negationtags: In a drug interaction study, co-administration of orally inhaled ciclesonide and oral erythromycin, an inhibitor of cytochrome P450 3A4, had <scope> <cue> no </cue> effect on the pharmacokinetics of either des-ciclesonide or erythromycin. </scope>

sentence.text: In another drug interaction study, co-administration of orally inhaled ciclesonide and oral ketoconazole, a potent inhibitor of cytochrome P450 3A4, increased the exposure (AUC) of des-ciclesonide by approximately 3.6-fold at steady state, while levels of ciclesonide remained unchanged.
Therefore, ketoconazole should be administered with caution with intranasal ciclesonide.
